ocean.question: I'm big and blue and have lots of water. Boats sail on me! What am I?

hints.text: 💧 Fish swim in me!
🌊 I have waves.
🚢 Boats float on me.

ocean.question: I'm a colorful fish with stripes. I can be found swimming in coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am often seen in animated movies
🎨 I have bright stripes to protect me.
🤡 People sometimes dress up like me

ocean.question: I have a shell and crawl on the sand. I can hide inside my shell. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am slow.
🏡 My home is always with me.
🏖️ You might find me on the beach.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can squirt ink! What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I'm good at hiding.
🖐️ I have many arms.
🫙 I can make the water dark.

ocean.question: I'm a big, gray animal that swims in the ocean. I sing songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I'm the biggest animal on Earth.
🌊 I live in the ocean.
🎶 I use sound to talk with others.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and flippers and swim in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I lay my eggs on the beach.
🥬 I like to eat seaweed.
🏊 I swim slowly.

ocean.question: I live in the sea and have a star shape. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have five arms.
🖐️ I sometimes hold onto rocks.
🍕 I look like a familiar shape.

ocean.question: I'm a type of ocean rock. Many fish live around me.

hints.text: 🧱 I am made of tiny animals.
🐠 Many colorful fish live near me.
🔆 I can be hurt by sunlight and changing waters.

ocean.question: I’m a long, thin fish that looks like a snake! What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I swim through rocks and caves.
⚡ I am very strong.
🌊 I look different than most fish.

ocean.question: I'm a very small animal that's a main food for many sea animals. What am I?

hints.text: 🦐 I am a type of crustacean.
🐋 Many animals need me to survive.
🔎 You need a magnifying glass to see me clearly!

animal.question: I quack and waddle. I like to swim in a pond. Who am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow when I'm a baby.
🌾 I like to eat bread.
🛁 I play in the water.

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. Who am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have black and white spots.
🌱 I eat grass in a field.
🥛 I give you something yummy to drink.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🌍 I am a very big animal.
🚿 I use my nose to spray water.

animal.question: I like to climb trees and eat bananas. Who am I?

hints.text: 🙈 I swing from branches.
🙊 I like to make funny faces.
🍌 My favourite food is yellow.

animal.question: I have a long neck and spots. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I eat leaves from tall trees.
🦒 I am very tall.
🎨 My spots are brown.

animal.question: I roar and I'm the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a big mane.
🦁 I live in Africa.
🥩 I like to eat meat.

animal.question: I hop around and I love carrots. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐰 I have long ears.
🥕 I love to eat orange things.
🌱 I live in a burrow.

animal.question: I swim in the ocean and I say 'blub'. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a very big animal that lives in the sea.
💦 I breath through a hole on top of my head.
🐟 I eat small fish.

animal.question: I slither on the ground and hiss. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I have no legs.
🥚 Some of us come from eggs.
🐭 I like to eat mice.

animal.question: I have stripes and love to run fast. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I am black and white
💨 I am related to a horse.
🌿 I eat grass on the savanna.
